manual/index.html.title: AchievementSystem.Steam | |
manual/index.html.keywords: AchievementSystem.Steam This is an extention package for AchievementSystem that enables usage of Steam Achievements Table of Contents Installation Usage Installation Install via Git URL You can also use the "Install from Git URL" option from Unity Package Manager to install the package. https://github.com/Studio-23-xyz/com.studio23.ss2.achievementsystem.steam.git#upm Usage Using AchievementSystem.Steam Create your ID Mapping Table if you haven't already. Attach the SteamAchievementProvider to a gameobject. And Add the steam app id. [IMPORTANT] Assign the IDMapper to the SteamAchievementProvider. Assign the provider to the AchievementSystem. Rest of the usage can be done from AchievementSystem Additional Features Reset All Stats From the inspector click on the cog of SteamAchievementProvider. Click on Reset All Stats.
